description.value:
This cloak appears to be woven from a thousand living leaves, hungry for flesh and eager to defend the cloak's wearer.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per minute

Trigger You are damaged by a melee attack from an adjacent creature

Effect The leaves lash out at your attacker, rising up to reveal snapping jaws made of wicked thorns. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23] saving throw.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[1d6[piercing]].

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[2d6[piercing]] and @Damage[2[bleed]].
